scripts.docker-remove-dev: ENVIRONMENT=dev && cd tools/docker/mysql && docker compose --env-file ../../../.env.${ENVIRONMENT} down --volumes --rmi all
scripts.docker-setup-dev: ENVIRONMENT=dev && cd tools/docker/mysql && docker compose --env-file ../../../.env.${ENVIRONMENT} up -d
scripts.docker-setup-prod: ENVIRONMENT=prod && cd tools/docker/mysql && docker compose --env-file ../../../.env.${ENVIRONMENT} up -d
